attrs.name: direction
attrs.desc: Scrolling direction; The optional values of this attribute are up / left / down / right
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is left.

attrs.name: hover-stop
attrs.desc: Whether to stop scrolling. The value can be false or true. The default value is true.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: time
attrs.desc: Time taken for scrolling. The default value is 5s.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 5

attrs.name: text
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this property is ScrollText
